title: 1990-2010 Documents Relating to Gifted and Talented Education curriculum, instructional materials, studies, and classwork/tests

communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: 1990-2010 Documents Relating to Gifted and Talented Education curriculum, instructional materials, studies, and classwork/tests
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am looking for any and all documents that would include details of the curriculum, instructional materials, classwork, or tests that were given to public school students, as well as any studies that were published using data collected from the students in the Gifted and Talented Education program in public schools.

The range of dates i am interested is anything between 1990 and 2010.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

John Nordberg
